Body: I carry a Cruz Tablet (T301) with Android 2.2.1.  A long time ago, when my tablet used to work remotely fine, I remember having a place to where I could obtain apps, just as long as I had internet.  After my factory reset, I haven't been able to find any apps on my tablet where I can download a market for apps.  Adding onto the fact I keep getting kicked off the internet, there is very little I know that I can do.  Does anyone have any suggestions for application markets, if and when my internet is restored to normal?
Title: Cruz T301: Where Can I Get New Apps?

history.Text: I carry a Cruz Tablet (T301) with Android 2.2.1.  A long time ago, when my tablet used to work remotely fine, I remember having a place to where I could obtain apps, just as long as I had internet.  After my factory reset, I haven't been able to find any apps on my tablet where I can download a market for apps.  Adding onto the fact [I keep getting kicked off the internet](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/113797/cruz-t301-internet-kick-off), there is very little I know that I can do.  Does anyone have any suggestions for application markets, if and when my internet is restored to normal?
Cruz T301: Where Can I Get New Apps?
